content: this legal text summarizes a notarial deed from 742003 regarding a property owned by mr qe the property consists of an apartment and a garage located in municipality castelfidardo the deed confirms that the building was constructed according to approved plans and permits mr qe and ci agree to divide the property into two shares with mr qe retaining ownership of the apartment and garage the other share includes the remaining real estate units and common areas the deed also states that the parties are separating their property regime and that all expenses related to the deed will be paid by mr qe
